# Solution

import sys

def peter_pan(input):
    peter_pan = [
        "..#..",
        ".#.#.",
        "#.X.#",
        ".#.#.",
        "..#.."
    ]
    wendy = [
        "..*..",
        ".*.*.",
        "*.X.*",
        ".*.*.",
        "..*.."
    ]
    for i in range(5):
        for j in range(len(input)):
            if j % 3 == 2:
                print(wendy[i].replace("X", input[j]), end="")
            else:
                print(peter_pan[i].replace("X", input[j]), end="")
        print()

input = sys.stdin.readline().strip()
peter_pan(input)
